DOC.brief_summary: The primary objective of this clinical study is to evaluate the preliminary safety and effectiveness of using the FLEX-1 device for the creation of an arteriovenous fistula (AVF) in patients requiring chronic hemodialysis.
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Clinical Evaluation of the Total Vascular Access (TVA) FLEX-1 Device Protocol FLEX-1-001
DOC.criteria: Eligible for a native surgical arteriovenous fistula, as determined by the treating physician. Adult (age >18 years old). Advanced chronic kidney disease (CKD), stage 4 or 5 electing for hemodialysis. Written informed consent obtained
